      • moveTreeScore

        public int moveTreeScore​(int depth,
                         boolean myTurn,
                         Location boundStart,
                         Location boundEnd)
        goes "down the tree" of possible next moves for each first move to make gets the max value in each tree and returns it to nextMove(int)
        Parameters:
        depth - the layers left to go, counts down each recursive call
        myTurn - if its my turn
        boundStart - the start of the bounding box
        boundEnd - the end of the bounding box
        Returns:
        the minimax value of the subtree so far
